page.title: 02Davenham Sub-Post Office
page.content: My mum and dad own a sub-post office. There are a number of duties a postmaster has to do.For instance,he has to sel postage stamps and savings certificates;pay out child benefit allowances;issue milk tokens,dog licenses,travellers' cheques,etc. A balance of the documents and money takes place every Friday.If the money is wrong,the difference has to come from the postmasters own pocket. Toughened glass and metal bars are around the counters to prevent theft. We also have a shop-side where we see chemist sundries(e.g. toothpaste and soap),stationary,tobacco,greetings cards and confectionary. The post office is open every day except Sunday.
